title: The Future: Cross-Chain Swaps
summary: A sneak peek at strict cross-chain atomic swaps coming soon to Intent Protocol.
content:
One Unified Liquidity Layer

The vision of Intent Protocol extends beyond a single chain. We are actively developing strict Atomic cross-chain swaps.

Coming Soon

Soon, you will be able to express an intent like:
"I want to sell ETH on Ethereum and receive APT on Aptos."

This will be handled by a sophisticated network of Solvers who manage inventory across multiple chains, providing you with a seamless, single-click experience. Stay tuned for updates!
author: Antony
